title: Dark Knight-Premium Watch Face
developerAddress: Office #2, 2nd Floor, 37-A, Civic Centre, Bahria Town, Islamabad
description: Dark Knight is not just a watchface for your smart wear it’s a whole new experience. Carefully hand crafted, precisely designed and creatively selected material to give you the feel of an actual premium watch. See the blend of dark texture with the elegance of steel to dwell into a majestic apparel. The Dial Design- Black base with complimenting textures of chrome, carbon fiber and brushed steel- Two steel dials for days and watch battery- Days dial counter at 9 o’clock- Battery dial counter at 3 o’clock- Hours and seconds hand designed with polished faceted steel texture- Majestic Crown logo at 12 o'clock- Angled date window at 6 o'clockThis watch face is for round/circular smart watches only such as the Huawei watch, LG Watch Urbane, LG Watch R and Motorola Moto 360. Visit our exclusive Watch face collection for Android Wear on our website www.frillroid.com.How it works?Its simple just download the app to your smartphone and sync it with the watch. The watch face that you will choose will be displayed on your watch screen. Open Settings from Android Wear app to customize the Watch Face. Get this app now and provide us your feedback :)
descriptionHTML:
Dark Knight is not just a watchface for your smart wear it’s a whole new experience. Carefully hand crafted, precisely designed and creatively selected material to give you the feel of an actual premium watch. See the blend of dark texture with the elegance of steel to dwell into a majestic apparel.

The Dial Design

- Black base with complimenting textures of chrome, carbon fiber and brushed steel
- Two steel dials for days and watch battery
- Days dial counter at 9 o’clock
- Battery dial counter at 3 o’clock
- Hours and seconds hand designed with polished faceted steel texture
- Majestic Crown logo at 12 o'clock
- Angled date window at 6 o'clock

This watch face is for round/circular smart watches only such as the Huawei watch, LG Watch Urbane, LG Watch R and Motorola Moto 360. Visit our exclusive Watch face collection for Android Wear on our website www.frillroid.com.

How it works?

Its simple just download the app to your smartphone and sync it with the watch. The watch face that you will choose will be displayed on your watch screen. Open Settings from Android Wear app to customize the Watch Face. Get this app now and provide us your feedback :)
comments: Sucks the life out of my battery. This is a great concept, however it sucks the life out of my battery.  Lost 15% battery life in 15 mins.  Please fix this as I payed for the app and would like to use it.  Also, I keep getting a notification to sync watch face to Android wear, but it already is...and this is the only face that does this.  When both these issues are fixed, I'd be glad to change my rating to 5 stars.
